text: We have an app in your store, and a customer is asking us to add some functionality for them.  We're keen to do this but they are asking for something that requires the marketing-emails scope.  It appears our dev account/test does not have this scope active.  Would it be possible to get this added to our dev account for a couple weeks to build out the functionality?

Hi Andy, you can manage the scopes required by your app(s) at anytime from your developer account. I agree it would make sense to first update your development version of the app and then reinstall it into a test account to ensure this is working properly before updating your production application. We have documentation that explains how to configure scopes in more detail: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/apps/public-apps/overview#configure-scopes>
Sorry, perhaps I was not clear.  Our dev HS account does not have the marketing-email scope for us to build and test this new feature.
You should know that adding new scopes will require existing install users to reauthorize your app with the new scopes to permission
Interesting. It should show using the search function from the settings page in the "Other" grouping
Ok. I will try to be more clear.
I can 100% add the scope in the HS dev ui.
